   16: -module(connect_SUITE).
   17: 
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   27: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   28:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   29:      || (E) =/= (V)])).
   30: -define(SECURE_USER, secure_joe).
   31: -define(CERT_FILE, "priv/ssl/fake_server.pem").
   32: -define(TLS_VERSIONS, ["tlsv1", "tlsv1.1", "tlsv1.2"]).
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Suite configuration
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: 
   38: all() ->
   39:     [{group, c2s_noproc}, %% should be first, uses vanilla config
   40:      {group, negative},
   41:      {group, pre_xmpp_1_0},
   42:      {group, starttls},
   43:              {group, feature_order},
   44:      {group, tls},
   45:      {group, ciphers_default},
   46:      {group, 'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'}].
   47: 
   48: groups() ->
   49:     [{c2s_noproc, [], [reset_stream_noproc,
   50:                        starttls_noproc,
   51:                        compress_noproc]},
   52:      {negative, [], [bad_xml,
   53:                      invalid_host,
   54:                      invalid_stream_namespace]},
   55:      {pre_xmpp_1_0, [], [pre_xmpp_1_0_stream]},
   56:      {starttls, test_cases()},
   57:      {feature_order, [parallel], [stream_features_test,
   58:                       tls_authenticate,
   59:                       tls_compression_fail,
   60:                       tls_compression_authenticate_fail,
   61:                       tls_authenticate_compression,
   62:                       auth_compression_bind_session,
   63:                       auth_bind_compression_session]},
   64:      {tls, generate_tls_vsn_tests()},
   65:      {ciphers_default, [], [clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers,
   66:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA',
   67:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA']},
   68:      {'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', [],
   69:       %% node2 accepts DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA exclusively (see ejabberd.cfg)
   70:       ['clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only']}].
   71: 
   72: test_cases() ->
   73:     generate_tls_vsn_tests() ++
   74:     [should_fail_with_sslv3,
   75:      should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls,
   76:      should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required].
   77: 
   78: suite() ->
   79:     escalus:suite().
   80: 
   81: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: %% Init & teardown
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: 
   85: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   86:     Config0 = escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd, []}} | Config]),
   87:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0),
   88:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   89:     assert_cert_file_exists(),
   90:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])).
   91: 
   92: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   93:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])),
   94:     restore_ejabberd_node(Config),
   95:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   96: 
   97: init_per_group(c2s_noproc, Config) ->
   98:     Config;
   99: init_per_group(starttls, Config) ->
  100:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config,
  101:                              fun mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern/0),
  102:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  103:     Config;
  104: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->
  105:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  106:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  107:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config, []),
  108:     JoeSpec = lists:keydelete(starttls, 1, proplists:get_value(?SECURE_USER, Users)),
  109:     JoeSpec2 = {?SECURE_USER, lists:keystore(ssl, 1, JoeSpec, {ssl, true})},
  110:     NewUsers = lists:keystore(?SECURE_USER, 1, Users, JoeSpec2),
  111:     lists:keystore(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers});
  112: init_per_group(feature_order, Config) ->
  113:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern/0),
  114:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  115:     Config;
  116: init_per_group(ciphers_default, Config) ->
  117:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  118:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  119:     [{c2s_port, 5222} | Config];
  120: init_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  121:     [{c2s_port, 5233} | Config];
  122: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  123:     Config.
  124: end_per_group(feature_order, Config) ->
  125:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
  126:     Config;
  127: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  128:     Config.
  129: 
  130: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  131:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  132: 
  133: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  134:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  135: 
  136: generate_tls_vsn_tests() ->
  137:     [list_to_existing_atom("should_pass_with_" ++ VSN)
  138:      || VSN <- ?TLS_VERSIONS].
  139: 
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: %% Tests
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: 
  144: bad_xml(Config) ->
  145:     %% given
  146:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  147:     %% when
  148:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_bad_xml(Spec),
  149:     %% then
  150:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  151:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  152:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  153:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"xml-not-well-formed">>, <<>>], Error),
  154:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  155: 
  156: invalid_host(Config) ->
  157:     %% given
  158:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  159:     %% when
  160:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_to_invalid_host(Spec),
  161:     %% then
  162:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  163:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  164:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  165:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"host-unknown">>, <<>>], Error),
  166:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  167: 
  168: invalid_stream_namespace(Config) ->
  169:     %% given
  170:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  171:     %% when
  172:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec),
  173:     %% then
  174:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  175:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"invalid-namespace">>, <<>>], Error),
  176:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  177: 
  178: pre_xmpp_1_0_stream(Config) ->
  179:     %% given
  180:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  181:     Steps = [
  182:              %% when
  183:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  184:              {legacy_stream_helper, failed_legacy_auth}
  185:             ],
  186:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  187:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  188:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  189: 
  190: should_fail_with_sslv3(Config) ->
  191:     %% GIVEN
  192:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  193:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, sslv3),
  194:     %% WHEN
  195:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1) of
  196:     %% THEN
  197:         _ ->
  198:             error(client_connected_using_sslv3)
  199:     catch
  200:         error:closed ->
  201:             ok
  202:     end.
  203: 
  204: should_pass_with_tlsv1(Config) ->
  205:     should_pass_with_tls(tlsv1, Config).
  206: 
  207: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.1'(Config) ->
  208:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.1', Config).
  209: 
  210: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.2'(Config) ->
  211:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.2', Config).
  212: 
  213: should_pass_with_tls(Version, Config)->
  214:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  215:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, Version),
  216: 
  217:     %% WHEN
  218:     Result = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1),
  219: 
  220:     %% THEN
  221:     ?assertMatch({ok, _, _, _}, Result).
  222: 
  223: should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls(Config) ->
  224:     %% GIVEN
  225:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  226:     {Conn, Props, Features} = start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec),
  227: 
  228:     %% WHEN
  229:     try escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props, Features) of
  230:     %% THEN
  231:         _ ->
  232:             error(authentication_without_tls_suceeded)
  233:     catch
  234:         throw:{auth_failed, User, AuthReply} ->
  235:             ?assertEqual(atom_to_binary(?SECURE_USER, utf8), User),
  236:             escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  237:                                              <<"Use of STARTTLS required">>],
  238:                            AuthReply)
  239:     end.
  240: 
  241: should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required(Config) ->
  242:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  243:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, [start_stream]),
  244:     Features = case escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_features) of
  245:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:features">>, children = Children} -> Children;
  246:         #xmlel{name = <<"features">>, children = Children} -> Children
  247:     end,
  248:     ?assertMatch([#xmlel{name = <<"starttls">>,
  249:                          children = [#xmlel{name = <<"required">>}]}],
  250:                  Features).
  251: 
  252: clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers(Config) ->
  253:     ?assert(length(ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)) > 0).
  254: 
  255: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA'(Config) ->
  256:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA",
  257:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  258: 
  259: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'(Config) ->
  260:     ?assertEqual(["DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA"],
  261:                  ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)).
  262: 
  263: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA'(Config) ->
  264:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA",
  265:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  266: 
  267: 
  268: reset_stream_noproc(Config) ->
  269:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  270:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  271:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  272:                end,
  273:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  274:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  275: 
  276:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  277:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  278:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  279:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  280:     %% Add auth element into message queue of the c2s process
  281:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  282:     ?assertThrow({timeout, auth_reply}, escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props)),
  283:     %% Sim client disconnection
  284:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  285:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  286:     %% Resume
  287:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  288:     receive
  289:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  290:             ok;
  291:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  292:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  293:         after 5000 ->
  294:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  295:     end,
  296:     ok.
  297: 
  298: starttls_noproc(Config) ->
  299:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  300:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  301:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  302:                end,
  303:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  304:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  305: 
  306:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  307:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  308:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  309:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  310:     %% Add starttls element into message queue of the c2s process
  311:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  312:     ?assertThrow({timeout, proceed}, escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props)),
  313:     %% Sim client disconnection
  314:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  315:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  316:     %% Resume
  317:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  318:     receive
  319:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  320:             ok;
  321:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  322:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  323:         after 5000 ->
  324:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  325:     end,
  326:     ok.
  327: 
  328: compress_noproc(Config) ->
  329:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  330:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  331:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  332:                end,
  333:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  334:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  335: 
  336:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  337:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  338:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  339:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  340:     %% Add compress element into message queue of the c2s process
  341:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  342:     ?assertThrow({timeout, compressed},
  343:                  escalus_session:compress(Conn, [{compression, <<"zlib">>}|Props])),
  344:     %% Sim client disconnection
  345:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  346:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  347:     %% Resume
  348:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  349:     receive
  350:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  351:             ok;
  352:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  353:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  354:         after 5000 ->
  355:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  356:     end,
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: %% Tests featuress advertisement
  360: stream_features_test(Config) ->
  361:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  362:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  363:     List = [start_stream, stream_features, {?MODULE, verify_features}],
  364:     escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, List),
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: verify_features(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  368:     %% should not advertise compression before tls
  369:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features)),
  370:     %% start tls. Starttls should be then removed from list and compression should be added
  371:     {Conn1, Props1} = escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props),
  372:     {Conn2, Props2, Features2} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn1, Props1, []),
  373:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features2)),
  374:     ?assert(false =/= has_feature(compression, Features2)),
  375:     %% start compression. Compression should be then removed from list
  376:     {Conn3, Props3, Features3} = escalus_session:authenticate(Conn2, Props2, Features2),
  377:     {Conn4, Props4} = escalus_session:compress(Conn3, Props3),
  378:     {Conn5, Props5, Features4} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn4, Props4, []),
  379:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features4)),
  380:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features4)),
  381:     {Conn5, Props5, Features4}.
  382: 
  383: has_feature(Feature, FeatureList) ->
  384:     {_, Value} = lists:keyfind(Feature, 1, FeatureList),
  385:     Value.
  386: 
  387: %% should fail
  388: tls_compression_authenticate_fail(Config) ->
  389:     %% Given
  390:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  391:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  392:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression, authenticate],
  393:     %% when and then
  394:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  395:         _ ->
  396:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  397:     catch
  398:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  399:             case Stanza of
  400:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  401:                     ok;
  402:                 _ ->
  403:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  404:             end
  405:     end.
  406: 
  407: tls_authenticate_compression(Config) ->
  408:     %% Given
  409:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  410:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  411:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate, maybe_use_compression],
  412:     %% then
  413:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  414:     % when and then
  415:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  416:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  417:     ?assert(false =/= Compress),
  418:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  419: 
  420: tls_authenticate(Config) ->
  421:     %% Given
  422:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  423:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  424:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate],
  425:     %% then
  426:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  427:     % when,
  428:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  429:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  430: 
  431: %% should fail
  432: tls_compression_fail(Config) ->
  433:     %% Given
  434:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  435:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  436:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression],
  437:     %% then and when
  438:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  439:         _ ->
  440:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  441:     catch
  442:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  443:             case Stanza of
  444:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  445:                     ok;
  446:                 _ ->
  447:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  448:             end
  449:     end.
  450: 
  451: auth_compression_bind_session(Config) ->
  452:     %% Given
  453:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  454:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  455:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  456:         authenticate, maybe_use_compression, bind, session],
  457:     %% then
  458:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  459:     % when
  460:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  461:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  462: 
  463: auth_bind_compression_session(Config) ->
  464:     %% Given
  465:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  466:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  467:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  468:         authenticate, bind, maybe_use_compression, session],
  469:     %% then
  470:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  471:     % when
  472:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  473:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  474: 
  475: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  476: %% Internal functions
  477: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  478: 
  479: c2s_port(Config) ->
  480:     case ?config(c2s_port, Config) of
  481:         undefined -> 5223;
  482:         Value -> Value
  483:     end.
  484: 
  485: ciphers_available_in_os() ->
  486:     CiphersStr = os:cmd("openssl ciphers 'ALL:eNULL'"),
  487:     [string:strip(C, both, $\n) || C <- string:tokens(CiphersStr, ":")].
  488: 
  489: ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config) ->
  490:     Port = c2s_port(Config),
  491:     lists:filter(fun(Cipher) ->
  492:                          openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port)
  493:                  end, ciphers_available_in_os()).
  494: 
  495: openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port) ->
  496:     PortStr = integer_to_list(Port),
  497:     Cmd = "echo '' | openssl s_client -connect localhost:" ++ PortStr ++
  498:         " -cipher " "\"" ++ Cipher ++ "\" 2>&1"
  499:         " | grep 'Cipher is " ++ Cipher ++ "'",
  500:     [] =/= os:cmd(Cmd).
  501: 
  502: restore_ejabberd_node(Config) ->
  503:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
  504:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
  505: 
  506: assert_cert_file_exists() ->
  507:     ejabberd_node_utils:file_exists(?CERT_FILE) orelse
  508:         ct:fail("cert file ~s not exists", [?CERT_FILE]).
  509: 
  510: config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, Fun) ->
  511:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file([Fun()], Config).
  512: 
  513: mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern() ->
  514:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, tls,"}.
  515: 
  516: mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern() ->
  517:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,  {zlib, 10000},"}.
  518: 
  519: mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern() ->
  520:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,"}.
  521: 
  522: set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec, Version) ->
  523:     [{ssl_opts, [{versions, [Version]}]} | UserSpec].
  524: 
  525: start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec) ->
  526:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_compression],
  527:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec,
  528:                                                             ConnetctionSteps),
  529:     {Conn, Props, Features}.
  530: 
  531: connect_to_invalid_host(Spec) ->
  532:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_to_invalid_host}]),
  533:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  534: 
  535: connect_to_invalid_host(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  536:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:stream_start(<<"hopefullynonexistentdomain">>,
  537:                                                    ?NS_JABBER_CLIENT)),
  538:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  539: 
  540: connect_with_bad_xml(Spec) ->
  541:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_with_bad_xml}]),
  542:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  543: 
  544: connect_with_bad_xml(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  545:     escalus_connection:send(Conn, #xmlcdata{content = "asdf\n"}),
  546:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  547: 
  548: connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec) ->
  549:     F = fun (Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  550:                 Start = stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(escalus_users:get_server([], Spec)),
  551:                 escalus:send(Conn, Start),
  552:                 {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}
  553:         end,
  554:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [F]),
  555:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  556: 
  557: stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(To) ->
  558:     legacy_stream_helper:stream_start(lists:keystore(stream_ns, 1, default_context(To),
  559:                                 {stream_ns, <<"obviously-invalid-namespace">>})).
  560: 
  561: default_context(To) ->
  562:     [{version, <<"version='1.0'">>},
  563:      {to, To},
  564:      {stream_ns, ?NS_XMPP}].
  565: 
  566: children_specs_to_pids(Children) ->
  567:     [Pid || {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children].
